member.name: M:DEMSoft.NURBS.NURBSSurface.KroneckerTensorProduct(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: If A is an m-by-n matrix and B is a p-by-q matrix, then the Kronecker tensor product of A and B is a large matrix formed by multiplying B by each element of A AB= |a11*B a12*B ... a1n*B| |a21*B a22*B ... a2n*B| |.....................| |am1*B am2*B ... amn*B|
